title: Leonor's Mexican Vegetarian Restaurant
typeOfFood: Vegan, Pizza, Organic, Fast food, Juice bar, Take-out, Mexican
description: Long-time operating small veggie restaurant with bar stools and tables. Offers a variety of Mexican food including sandwiches and veggie burgers using mock meats and soy cheese. Pizza is made with a whole wheat crust topped with soy cheese and toppings of choice (note that soy cheese might not be vegan). Freshly squeezed carrot and orange juices available.
